title: Reflections 2 = Reflexiones 2 [Destinos: Ep. 26]
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Foreign language films
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
description: Episode number 26 of Series "Destinos: an introduction to Spanish". Twenty-sixth episode in a series of Spanish language programs. In this episode, Raquel reflects upon what has happened from the very beginning of her investigation. This episode revises the second half of the series. No new vocabulary is introduced, simply try to understand what is being said by all the different characters in their conversational Spanish.
